engagements.title: Workshop on Generative AI for Shared Services & GBS
engagements.description: Led a workshop and participated in a panel discussion on GenAI data strategies and implementation in shared services.

engagements.title: Strategic Cloud Migration & IT Modernization
engagements.description: Presented best practices on cloud migration and modernizing IT infrastructure for enhanced business agility.

engagements.title: AI for Business Transformation
engagements.description: Shared insights on enterprise-wide AI innovation and its impact on business transformation.

engagements.title: Integration of Kubernetes in Azure

engagements.title: Microsoft's Partnership with OpenAI
engagements.description: Discussed the future opportunities, ethical considerations, and evolution of the AI ecosystem following Microsoft's alliance with OpenAI.
